snippet.title: Crying Suns - Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the free demo now on Steam: http://bit.ly/2AOW7rx

Crying Suns is a tactical rogue-lite that puts you in the role of a space fleet commander as you explore a mysteriously fallen empire. In this story-driven experience inspired by Dune and Foundation, each successful run will uncover the truth about the Empire... and yourself as well.

Steam Store: http://bit.ly/2AOW7rx
Twitter: http://twitter.com/CryingSuns
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/CryingSuns
Discrod: https://discordapp.com/invite/NxCtG8Y
Website: http://www.cryingsuns.com/

Release Date: September 19, 2019
Genres: Indie, tactical, story rich, roguelite
Platforms: PC, Mac OSX
Languages: English, French, Spanish, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese.

Music: Aymeric Schwartz

A game by Alt Shift
Published by Humble Bundle
